Name: Luxury
Description: A product which satisfies a desire for nice things.

Name: Inferior
Description: A product which is cheap, and poorly made, but may be attractive to the frugal.

Name: Security
Description: A product which gives a sense of physical security.

Name: Food
Description: A product which can stand in for roughly one meal 1 meal (1000 calories).

Name: Heat
Description: A rough measure of about 1 kw of energy released by the product.

Name: Life
Description: The product is alive. Should only ever have 1.

Name: Clothing
Description: The product can act as clothing, protecting the owner from the environment.

Name: Waste
Description: This product is a waste product and no one wants it.

Name: Housing
Description: A product which offers an owner a space to call their own.
